metadata.title: CVE-2009-5155 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - negligible
metadata.description: In the GNU C Library (aka glibc or libc6) before 2.28, parse_reg_exp inposix/regcomp.c misparses alternatives, which allows attackers to cause adenial of service (assertion failure and application exit) or trigger anincorrect result by attempting a regular-expression match.

criterions.comment: glibc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
gnulib: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
